summary: The diff implements boot-time validation/clearing for persisted image/video backgrounds, avoids persisting transient runtime error state, and adds an in-overlay "Clear background" recovery action. It also adds YouTube fatal-error auto-clear behavior. One non-requested change updates project_state.json metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal project tracking metadata (project_state.json) to add/track AR-* requests with pending status.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on runtime background loading/persistence behavior and UI recovery controls; it does not request changes to repository metadata/tracking files.
